institution-wrap.institution: Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare

award-group.award-id: Emerging and re-emerging infectious diseases and vaccine policy research program

funding-group.funding-statement: This study was conducted under 'Research on rabies prevention policy in Japan reflecting the change of social situation', in 'The Emerging and re-emerging infectious diseases and vaccine policy research program' of the Health, Labour Science Research Grant, funded by the Ministry of Health, Labour, and Welfares of Japan http://iss.ndl.go.jp/books/R100000002-I026621098-00. KH was funded by the Wellcome Trust (095787/Z/11/Z). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
